## Example Plot of Diamond Prices

```{r}
#| fig-cap: "Diamond Prices"

library(ggplot2)
ggplot(data = diamonds) + 
  aes(x = carat, y = price, colour = cut) + 
  scale_x_sqrt() + 
  geom_point(alpha = 0.1)
```
